definition: to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
to substitute for/to replace/to supersede
to replace/to take the place of
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to replace/to take over (a position or post)
to replace/alternately/in turn
to replace
stand-in/substitute/body double/stuntman/scapegoat/fall guy/to stand in for sb else
substitute/alternative
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
scapegoat
to assume sb's name and take his place (idiom); to impersonate/to pose under a false name
to take turns/to work by roster
to do everything oneself (idiom); not to allow others in on the act
scapegoat/fall guy

sentences.english: I was embarrassed for her when she slipped and fell.
sentences.chinese: 當她滑了一跤跌倒時，我替她感到困窘。

sentences.english: One day if I cannot take your umbrella that I will accompany you in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 有天如果我不能替你撐傘那我就陪你淋雨。

sentences.english: Well, I am just sitting in for him for a while.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我只是替他代班，在這裏坐一下。

sentences.english: He has had a bit of trouble, and I have to straighten it out for him.
sentences.chinese: 他遇到了點兒麻煩，我得替他把這事了結掉。

sentences.english: I'll give you a message for your Master Shifu.
sentences.chinese: 那你也替我捎個信給你那個什麼師父。

sentences.english: She feared for the little boy when she saw him at the top of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 看着樹頂上的小男孩，她替他捏了一把汗。

sentences.english: She demeans herself by doing his dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 她替他幹卑鄙的勾當，貶低了自己的人格。

sentences.english: Zhigung Celestial Burial Ground has masters who are monks with Zhigungti Monastery of the Garyu Sect.
sentences.chinese: 直貢天葬場有來自噶舉派直貢替寺的喇嘛天葬師。

sentences.english: But there is a troubling subtext: the author’s attempts to exculpate himself.
sentences.chinese: 不過令人煩惱的是，作者總打算替自己開脫。

sentences.english: How many is that the moisture-preserving powder cake of Diao congealed fat special counter replaces the core price?
sentences.chinese: 迪奧凝脂保溼粉餅專櫃替芯的價格是多少呀？
每天替嬰兒所用的奶瓶消毒。

sentences.english: His lawyer said Underwood had gone to see his girlfriend and wanted to finish a domestic argument.
sentences.chinese: 他的律師替他辯護道，他是去找女友了，想把架吵完。

sentences.english: No, I have to set up a display for the computer exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 沒有，我得替電腦展做好陳列。

sentences.english: Will someone fetch a pail of water?
Christ expiated the sins and propitiated the divine wrath for all his people.
sentences.chinese: 基督替祂的子民贖了他們的罪，並且挽回了神的忿怒。

sentences.english: The purpose of this event is to raise funds for Typhoon Morakot victims.
sentences.chinese: 這次的活動是爲了替莫拉克颱風的災民籌款。

definition: old variant of 幫|帮[bang1]
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to be made a scapegoat/to be unjustly blamed
to give thought (to others)/to consider (other people's needs)/also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]
to exculpate/to absolve/to exonerate
to return sth to sb
to do sth in place of sb else
to supply/to provide
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to cry out against injustice/to protest unfairness
to request sb to do sth/please!
to worry about
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
oneself/one's own
to comfort/to console/CL:個|个[ge4]
